main event: Two to three red lights were observed moving from east to west in Amarillo, Texas on November 10, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for two to three minutes and was made by military personnel., The observation was categorized as a ground-visual., The witnesses could not determine the exact characteristics of the objects due to darkness., A bright light on the bottom of the objects resembled a searchlight or floodlight., The report mentions a rise in UFO sightings in the area, linked to increased public awareness.
sighted object: red lights moving in the sky
